meanings.definition: A device that fits into the cylinder head of an internal combustion engine and ignites the fuel mixture by means of an electric spark.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic replaced the old sparkplug in the car engine.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the sparkplug regularly for any signs of wear.
meanings.sent3: When the sparkplug went on strike, the engine refused to start.
meanings.sent4: The sparkplug of innovation ignited a wave of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: Without the sparkplug, the engine remained silent and motionless.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that stimulates or energizes a group or activity.
meanings.sent1: She was the sparkplug behind the successful fundraising event.
meanings.sent2: In a dull meeting, a good joke can act as a sparkplug.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy was like a sparkplug, running around the house.
meanings.sent4: His motivational speech acted as a sparkplug, inspiring everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The music was the sparkplug that brought life to the party.
